bs-pagetemplates-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of page templates extension
prefs-pagetemplates:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for avatars section in preferences.
{{Identical|Page template}}
bs-pagetemplates-empty-page:
Anchor text for empty page
{{Identical|Empty page}}
bs-pagetemplates-empty-page-desc: Text for start with an empty page.
bs-pagetemplatesadmin-label:
Anchor text in admin tab for page templates 
{{Identical|Page template}}
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-desc-toolong: Text for the description is too long. Please use a maximum of 255 characters.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-label-toolong: Text for the label is to long. Please use a maximum of 255 characters.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-label-empty: Text for please enter a label.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-name-toolong: Text for the template name is to long. Please use a maximum of 255 characters.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-name-empty: Text for please enter a template name.
bs-pagetemplates-no-id: Text for please enter a page to be used as template.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-added: Text for the template has been added.
bs-pagetemplates-invalid_pfx: Text for the prefix is invalid.
bs-pagetemplates-nooldtpl: Text for the old template could not be found.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-edited: Text for the changes have been saved.
bs-pagetemplates-dberror: Text for a database error occurred.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-deleted: Text for the template has been deleted.
bs-pagetemplates-choose-template:
text for this page doesn't exist yet. You can create a new page. If you don't want to do that, click the back button of your browser to return to the last page visited. 

You can choose {{PLURAL:$1||one of}} the following {{PLURAL:$1|template|templates}}: 
* $1 is the number of templates use it for PLURAL distinction
bs-pagetemplates-pref-excludens: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for do not show templates in these namespaces:
bs-pagetemplates-pref-forcenamespace: Label for checkbox in [{{canonicalurl:Special:BlueSpice_Preferences}} Special:BlueSpice_Preferences]. When set, a new page created via PageTemplates will be put in the namspace indicated in the page template's properties.
bs-pagetemplates-pref-hideifnotintargetn: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for hide template if the page is not to be created in the target namespace
bs-pagetemplates-pref-hidedefaults: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for hide default templates
bs-pagetemplates-headerlabel:
This is the label for the field named "label". Each page template has a "label" and a "description", which are shown to the user in a list when creating a new page. The "label" is used as the "heading" in the list and generally is the "name" of a single page template.
{{Identical|Label}}
bs-pagetemplates-confirm-deletetpl:
Used as text of the confirmation window. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of templates which will be deleted - use for PLURAL distinction
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Bs-pagetemplates-tipdeletetemplate}}
bs-pagetemplates-remove-message-unknown: An unexpected error occurred while trying to delete a template.
bs-pagetemplates-remove-message-success:
Success message that one or more templates were deleted. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of deleted templates - use for PLURAL distinction
* $2 - a comma separated list of deleted templates
bs-pagetemplates-remove-message-failure:
Error message that one or more templates could not be deleted.

Parameters:
* $1 - the number of templates which could not be deleted - use for PLURAL distinction
* $2 - a list of the templates which could not be deleted
* $3 - a list with the reason for each template why they could not be deleted

action-pagetemplatesadmin-viewspecialpag:
Label for denied special page, includes pagename
{{doc-action|pagetemplatesadmin-viewspecialpage}}
pagetemplatesadmin: Page title for page template admin special page
bs-usagetracker-pagetemplates: Name of the descriptor used in [[Special:UsageTracker|Special:UsageTracker]] output
bs-pagetemplates-nsm-label: Label for field in BlueSpiceNamespaceManager used to select namespaces in which PageTemplates will be shown(enabled)
right-pagetemplatesadmin-viewspecialpage:
Grants access to the [[Special:PageTemplatesAdmin]] special page, where page templates can be managed.
{{doc-right|pagetemplatesadmin-viewspecialpage}}
